scene.name: intro
scene.line: There's nobody buried here, you know. It's decorative, I guess ...
Or it's art or something, I don't know.
scene.option: What are the names on the headstones?

scene.name: decorative-graveyard
scene.line: Weaver's folks were like that. Not morbid, I mean, but strange. Careless with tragic ideas.

scene.name: headstone-names
scene.line: "Nowakowski," "Padilla" ... I don't know those names. Maybe the people who lived here before? I know when they bought this property it already had a house and everything. Or maybe they have some other symbolic meaning.

scene.name: marquez-headstone
scene.line: Oh, and look at that headstone: "MÃ¡rquez." I used to think that was for my parents. Now I don't know.
